meanings.definition: The quality or state of being stiff or rigid due to the presence of starch.
meanings.sent1: The starchiness of the shirt made it uncomfortable to wear.
meanings.sent2: The potatoes had a noticeable starchiness when cooked.
meanings.sent3: The starchiness of the paper made it difficult to fold neatly.
meanings.sent4: The starchiness of her attitude was evident in her strict rules.
meanings.sent5: The starchiness of the fabric made it seem like cardboard.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a starchy taste or texture.
meanings.sent1: The soup's starchiness was overpowering and not enjoyable.
meanings.sent2: The bread had a pleasant starchiness that complemented the meal.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected starchiness of the ice cream left a strange aftertaste.
meanings.sent4: Her words had a certain starchiness that made them hard to swallow.
meanings.sent5: The starchiness of the cookie made it feel like biting into a cloud.
